name: prueba-carga-login
description: Pruebas de carga automatizadas con Artillery

scripts.test:smoke: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery.yml --environment smoke --output report_smoke.json && artillery report report_smoke.json --output report_smoke.html
scripts.test:load: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery.yml --environment production --output report_load.json && artillery report report_load.json --output report_load.html
scripts.test:smoke:admin: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery-admin.yml --environment smoke --output report_smoke_admin.json && artillery report report_smoke_admin.json --output report_smoke_admin.html
scripts.test:load:admin: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery-admin.yml --environment production --output report_load_admin.json && artillery report report_load_admin.json --output report_load_admin.html
scripts.test:stress: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery.yml --environment stress --output report_stress.json && artillery report report_stress.json --output report_stress.html
scripts.test:stress:admin: dotenv -e .env -- artillery run artillery-admin.yml --environment stress --output report_stress_admin.json && artillery report report_stress_admin.json --output report_stress_admin.html
